  assert_equals: expected "0px" but got "1px"

  assert_equals: expected "0%" but got "1px"

  assert_equals: expected "0px" but got "1px"

  assert_equals: expected "auto" but got "1px"

  assert_equals: expected "auto" but got "1px"

  assert_equals: expected "auto" but got "1px"
